Posts.Title: Chemo poisoning and shivers . . .

Posts.Content: Hi, my name is Stevie and I've joined in an attempt to help my mother. Having undergone surgery, chemo and radiotherapy she has been left shivering and depressed. Every day maybe for an hour or maybe for 12 she is cold. Blankets and hot water bottles do not help. she is cold inside and its been suggested chemo poisoning is the reason. Can anyone advise on this?? I'm helpless and saddened at her demise and outlook on her life!
